snippet.textDisplay: Why do you lie to children? That is not okay.
snippet.textOriginal: Why do you lie to children? That is not okay.

snippet.textDisplay: @John Lee hurting their feelings? Bahahaha if you do not lie, deceive them, and play psychotic games like elf on a shelf during Christmas children would be much better off. Also as a side note it's great to teach your kids that hard work and dedication will get them nice things, not a fairy tale.
snippet.textOriginal: @John Lee hurting their feelings? Bahahaha if you do not lie, deceive them, and play psychotic games like elf on a shelf during Christmas children would be much better off. Also as a side note it's great to teach your kids that hard work and dedication will get them nice things, not a fairy tale.

snippet.textDisplay: *WHAT'S NOT OK IS HURTING THEIR FEELINGS. AND VIRGINIA O'HANLON, A REAL PERSON, WROTE A LETTER TO THE NEW YORK SUN ASKING THAT VERY QUESTION, AND WHAT WAS THEIR REPLY? "YES VIRGINIA, THERE IS A SANTA CLAUS."*
